oai_dc:dc.dc:title: From niche to volume with integrity and trust. Case study fact sheet. Planika - Slovenia
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: Borec, Andreja
Prišenk, Jernej
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Values, standards and certification
Food systems
Country reports
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Planika dairy has long history that dates back to 1957. The present structure of the company as a limited liability company (LLC) dates back to 1995, and was established by the Tolmin agricultural cooperative. The company’s raw material (milk) comes exclusively from 120-130 (from year to year) local mountain farms in the North and North-Western regions of Slovenia, especially the Tolmin, Kobarid, and Idrija regions.
oai_dc:dc.dc:identifier: Borec, Andreja and Prišenk, Jernej (2015) From niche to volume with integrity and trust. Case study fact sheet. Planika - Slovenia. University of Maribor, Faculty of Agriculture and Life Sciences.
